Text:
• LOVE
  • CELEBS
  • BEAUTY
  • GIFT IDEAS

Can you Guess This Grandmothers Age?

Why is her $5 Miracle Skin Cream Considered the #1 Anti-Aging product in The World? - Hollywood loves it while Plastic Surgeons & Botox Doctors Hate It!

Imagine hiding out in your home only to venture out early morning when people are still asleep or late at night under the cover of darkness. This was my life almost three years ago. I always had beautiful, flawless skin into my early forties, but then suddenly my skin started to look older and pigmentation started coming through along with sudden onset of adult acne. Seriously, what was happening to me? As a Christian I prayed every day for God to help me find what I needed to look good again.

When a colleague at work remarked at how very different she looked from a company photo of a picnic five years back. “Gee, Christine, your genes have really let you down, no?”, Christine Scott was mortified.
“I was speechless. To hear someone say out loud what I was already thinking was too much. I wanted the floor to open up and just disappear and cry.”

Christine had spent hundreds of dollars up to this point, on facial creams without any success. Her husband and sisters who had supported her through this trial, urged her to make her own products as she was getting increasingly frustrated. I knew if I worked hard and put my faith in God, I would find a solution.
“During my researching, with my faith as strong as ever, I was guided to two ingredients that restored and regenerated cell structure; Proprietary Biosphere and QuSome.”

Christine needed something that would repair her damaged skin, get rid of her age spots, eliminate her acne scars and make her skin glow. “With the Grace of God, I knew I was going to see results with these ingredients and included them in Biovi Derma Serum.”
After much trial and error, she created Biovi Derma Serum. It took her two years of testing, and going back to the drawing board time and time again.
“Just a few short weeks after using Biovi Derma Serum I noticed my scars and pigmentation starting to fade. My skin was dewy and slowly it started to look luminous. I was getting my glow back!”

At work, colleagues started commenting on how beautiful she looked. “What’s your secret?” everyone asked. And the colleague who had made the gene comment, well let’s just say Christine left her speechless.

No more hiding herself from the world. With her new skin came a new confidence. After a few weeks of launching Biovi Derma Serum Christine quit her job to focus on sharing her secret with other women who were going through what she went through.

“The best thing you can do for yourself is to put your faith in God and look in the mirror and love what you see, for we are made in His image. For so long I struggled with that but not anymore. I want other women to feel what I feel every time they look at themselves in the mirror!”
Christine Scotts has created a line of products to help women recapture their youthful glow and looks. Right now she is giving away a FREE TRIAL of Biovi Derma Serum for a limited time only.
Women have been sharing before and after pictures after using Christine Scotts skin care, the results, as you can see in this article, speak for themselves.

We want you to experience the same amazing results. You won’t be disappointed! For a limited time, we are offering you Christine’s exclusive $5 Skin Cream so you can regain your skin’s lustre, fade scars and pigmentation and be truly radiant again. And what better time than the holiday season? So what is in Christine’s products?
2 Key Ingredients For Anti Aging:

1. Proprietary Bisophere
2. QuSome
These are both natural ingredients that work together to erase wrinkles and fine lines at the cellular level – below the surface of the skin – which is why they’re so effective.

Proprietary Bisophere, The Fountain of Youth:
The first piece of the anti-aging puzzle is Proprietary Bisophere.
"Proprietary Bisophere is the secret to cheat your age". -Dr. Oz

Proprietary Bisophere penetrates deep into damaged skin and stimulates new collagen – a protein which makes skin appear plump and firm. It's all the rage in beauty circles, much in part because of a 2009 study stating, applying non-prescription Proprietary Bisophere to your skin caused a 60% reduction in fine lines and wrinkles. Experts agree that this is why it is so effective. It was one of the few products on the market that had Proprietary Bisophere in the right consistency and dosage.

QuSome:
The second piece, when combined properly with Proprietary Bisophere, literally makes your face look two decades younger in a matter of weeks! QuSome works by binding to moisture. It can hold up to 1,000 times its weight in water, making it an excellent natural skin plumper. QuSome helps your skin repair and regenerate itself after suffering from dryness, environmental stresses, or irritation. One of, if not the only products you can buy over the counter with an effective concentration of QuSome was found in .

"What Proprietary Bisophere & QuSome do is get rid of all the old, dead layers of skin and help your skin generate fresh new ones. Our tests show that you can erase almost 10 to 20 years off your face in less than 14 days. But the key is to choose the creams and serums that contain the highest and purest quality ingredients, since they’re not all the same.“
"How do I use it?"

It's acutally very simple. You simply use this product before bed as Dr. Oz said on the show that, "the trick is to use these products daily". This product contains high concentrations of pure Proprietary Bisophere and QuSome in just the right concentrations. We hear at People also discovered that they contain all sorts of anti-oxidants, an ingredient called Dermaxyl (also known as facelift in a jar) and Ester-C (the active anti-aging compound in Proprietary Bisophere).
"I'm excited for everyone to be able to try Biovi Derma Serum - it really is the fountain of youth in a bottle"
We Decided to Put it to the Test!

As excited as we were to hear about Biovi Derma Serum, we wanted to research Christine's anti-aging ingredients ourselves before we wrote this feature piece praising her. We decided to take one volunteer from our readers. Kim Allen, who jumped at the chance to trial this product. Here are her results...
Kim's 14 Day Biovi Derma Serum Results:

Kim is a 62 year grandma of 2 from Chicago. Like most women her age, the years have started to give her unwanted lines and wrinkles. Kim said she decided to trial Biovi Derma Serum because she was so frustrated that nothing else has produced results. She was even considering a highly risky and very expensive facelift procedure. Biovi Derma Serum was somewhat of a last resort for her.
Here are her results....

DAY 1

"After the first day of using Biovi Derma Serum, I was shocked at the drastic results. The lines, dark spots, and wrinkles - without question - were visibly reduced in size right before my eyes! I was astonished by the results, and literally felt 15 years younger again. It was like watching all my wrinkles and fine lines vanish right off!

I don't know how else to describe it! I could feel a warm tingling sensation on my cheeks, around my eyes, and on my forehead. I looked in the mirror and saw that my face looked a bit rosy - the result of revitalizing blood rushing to the surface of my skin to renew my face.

After the product was absorbed into my skin, my face looked firmer and had a beautiful glow to it."

DAY 5

"After five days of using Biovi Derma Serum I was shocked at the drastic results.

The lines, dark spots, and wrinkles - without question - were visibly reduced in size right before my eyes!

I was astonished by the results, and literally felt 15 years younger again. It was like watching all my wrinkles and fine lines vanish right off!"

DAY 14

"After 14 days, not only had all my doubts and scepticism absolutely vanished - SO DID MY WRINKLES!

The lines on my forehead, the loose, sagging skin on my neck, my crows’ feet – even the age spots on my face had COMPLETELY disappeared. I've never felt or seen anything tighten my skin with this kind of force before, no matter how expensive the product!

After the 2 weeks, my skin not only stayed that way, it actually improved every day until it became as beautiful and radiant as it was 20 years ago. By this point, all my friends and family were shocked. They couldn't believe the difference, and were convinced I was lying about not getting botox - I CAN'T WAIT to show them this article!"

"I couldn't believe my transformation, after feeling "too old". I honestly had almost given up on hoping that there was a cheap and effective solution out there that could really remove wrinkles. There's hype everywhere surrounding products that simply don't work, but to my amazement, Biovi Derma Serum did exactly what Christine said it would do.
I couldn't believe how much my confidence was boosted and how much attention from men I was getting. I'm married of course, but it still feels good to have others find you beautiful and attractive."
Before and after picture of Kim Allen. The picture on the right was taken after only 14 days of using Biovi Derma Serum
"My skin looks incredible...even younger and smoother than when I was 35 - Thank you Biovi Derma Serum!" the grandma-of-two exclusively told People Magazine of her wrinkle transformation.
The Verdict:
Using Biovi Derma Serum, removed virtually 90% of all Kim's wrinkles and problem areas. It tightened her face and neck, removing all signs of sagging, aging, and dehydrated skin.
Will This Work For You?

There is plenty of skincare hype out there, and most of those products are ridiculously expensive. With so many options it’s only natural to be skeptical about the results, and so we don't want to promise our readers anything - instead we simply want to challenge you to do what many in Hollywood recommend to their friends and family: try it for yourself!
Please remember you want to use daily for best results.

For your convenience, we have provided the link to . As of the writing of this article they are offering Free Test Trials of Biovi Derma Serum for the holiday season. Use the links below and you will get the lowest possible shipping price as well.
Holiday Free Trial Links:

READER RESULTS
Lacey Johnson, age 53 submitted this photo of her results with Biovi Derma Serum. You look great, Lacey!
" Biovi Derma Serum is the absolute best wrinkle removing product I’ve ever used. I thought my days of looking young were long gone. I can’t thank you enough for this!

Lacey Johnson
Charleston, South Carolina
